object.content: 1d10*10,silver ewer,carved bone statuette,carved ivory statuette,finely wrought small gold bracelet
3d6*10,cloth of gold vestments,black velvet mask with numerous citrines,silver chalice with lapis lazuli gems
1d6*100,large well-done wool tapestry,brass mug with jade inlays
1d10*100,silver comb with moonstones,silver-plated steel longsword with jet jewel in hilt
2d6*100,carved harp of exotic wood with ivory inlay and zircon gems,10 lb. solid gold idol
3d6*100,gold dragon comb with red garnet eye,gold and topaz bottle stopper cork,ceremonial electrum dagger with a star ruby in the pommel
4d6*100,eyepatch with mock eye of sapphire and moonstone,fire opal pendant on a fine gold chain,old masterpiece painting
5d6*100,embroidered silk and velvet mantle with numerous moonstones,sapphire pendant on gold chain
1d4*1000,embroidered and bejeweled glove,jeweled anklet,gold music box
1d6*1000,golden circlet with four aquamarines,a necklace of small pink pearls
2d6*1000,gold and ruby ring,gold cup set with emeralds
